creator: exit@citiz.net
text:
if AddDefaultCharset is set to 'ISO-8859-1' as default,that is really boring.
SP. to other charset,such as GB2312,if AddDefaultCharset is on,The MS IE will 
always be set to ISO-8859-1.
So the option of AddDefaultCharset should be removed , just as 
#AddDefaultCharset

thanks

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 23421 ***
